posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Hi All, hopefully this will be a quick one.

I'm about to embark on my first PM build, and am a little unclear about the prerequisite of having arcane casting of level 3+. Does this mean the PC has to be able to actually cast a level 3 spell, have the potential to do so , or simply needs 3 levels of an arcane caster class (like AA only requires 1 level of Bard/ Wiz/ Sorc, regardless of whether they can actually cast or not)?

I can't seem to find an answer, so I come to you good people.

Thanks in advance.

Cheers

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content: You need a non-good aligned character with 3 levels in an arcane caster class - bard, wizard or sorcerer.

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Oh, huge thanks, Mick! I'd spent the entire morning working on something, then at the last minute thought: "crap, what if I actually need to be able to cast?" Your news has calmed me.

Cheers
